alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 11:21AM EST until March 06 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...LIGHT FREEZING RAIN CONTINUES... .Temperatures are gradually climbing this morning but remain below freezing through the western Maine mountains. Areas of freezing rain will continue through early afternoon before precipitation comes to an end or temperatures rise above freezing. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Central Somerset, Northern Franklin and Northern Oxford Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
